sentences.sContent: The studio manager will cue you when it’s your turn to come on.
sentences.sCn: 该你上场的时候，制作经理会提示你的。

phrases.pCn: 撞球台上的白色球，母球

trans.tranOther: to give someone a sign that it is the right moment for them to speak or do something, especially during a performance
an action or event that is a signal for something else to happen
